{{Joke feature}}
This page serves as a compact list of all unique [[texture]]s that exist in released [[List of April Fools' jokes|joke]] versions of ''Minecraft''. For an overview on when each texture was changed, see the appropriate [[History of textures]] subpages.

Original texture files for {{JE}} can be extracted from the .jar files.
